article.heading: Bringing you the best audio gear
article.text: Located at the heart of New York City, Audiophile is the premier store for high end headphones, earphones, speakers, and audio accessories. We have a large showroom and luxury demonstration rooms available for you to browse and experience a wide range of our products. Stop by our store to meet some of the fantastic people who make Audiophile the best place to buy your portable audio equipment.

products.name: XX99 Mark II Headphones
products.about: The new XX99 Mark II headphones is the pinnacle of pristine audio. It redefines your premium headphone experience by reproducing the balanced depth and precision of studio-quality sound.

products.name: prXX99 Mark I Headphones
products.about: As the gold standard for headphones, the classic XX99 Mark I offers detailed and accurate audio reproduction for audiophiles, mixing engineers, and music aficionados alike in studios and on the go.

products.name: XX59 Headphones
products.about: Enjoy your audio almost anywhere and customize it to your specific tastes with the XX59 headphones. The stylish yet durable versatile wireless headset is a brilliant companion at home or on the move.

products.name: XX98 Mark I Headphones
products.about: The new XX99 Mark II headphones is the pinnacle of pristine audio. It redefines your premium headphone experience by reproducing the balanced depth and precision of studio-quality sound.
